name: Reverie - A Heroes Tale
description: A retro RPG adventure. Create your party, conquer dungeons, enter dreams, and choose your allies wisely in your quest to save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
